fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Competition, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market
eu_initiatives: The interests of the services sector including the Services Directive, services in industrial policy and standardisation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit: The European Business Services Round Table is a forum of European trade federations representing companies in the business-related services sector. It aims to provide a single point of reference in policy matters for this very diverse sector of the economy.
